attributes.action: Keep gyms open during lockdown, they are essential for mental & physical health
attributes.additional_details: Going to the gym is essential for the mental and physical health of individuals. Gyms should be classed as essential and not forced to close during lockdown. It is more important than ever to allow people to focus on improving their mind and body through exercise in gyms, especially during the winter months when exercise outdoors is limited. Working full time leaves people little time to exercise in the daylight (if at all) during the winter months.
attributes.background: Deem gyms essential and allow them to remain open during lockdown

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
